note: Poverty data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Share in poverty vs. educational attainment
subtitle: Educational attainment is measured as the average number of years of total schooling across all education levels, for the population aged 15-64. Poverty is measured as the share of population living below $3.65 per day.

display.name: Share of population living below $3.65 per day
